snippet: The temporary closing of East and West Drives  could become a seasonal tradition, creating a car-free refuge for cyclists and pedestrians in most of the park.
abstract: Bloomberg administration announces plans to close Central Park's East and West Drives to car traffic north of 72nd Street through Labor Day, effectively creating car-free refuge for cyclists and pedestrians in most of park; temporary closing could become seasonal tradition.
lead_paragraph: The temporary closing of East and West Drives  could become a seasonal tradition, creating a car-free refuge for cyclists and pedestrians in most of the park.

headline.main: City to Close 2 Drives in Central Park Through Labor Day
headline.print_headline: City to Close 2 Drives in Central Park Through Labor Day
